snippet: Two police officers shot and wounded an armed man early Sunday morning around a public housing development in East Harlem, the police said.
abstract: Two New York City police officers on routine patrol in an East Harlem housing development shoot and wound Michael Schultz after he points a weapon at them; Schultz, hospitalized in critical but stable condition with several gunshot wounds to his body, is charged with attempted assault of a police officer.
lead_paragraph: Two police officers shot and wounded an armed man early Sunday morning around a public housing development in East Harlem, the police said.

headline.main: Police Shoot Armed Man in an East Harlem Housing Project
headline.print_headline: Police Shoot Armed Man in an East Harlem Housing Project
